title: Bug 4971: Strange 'copy package'
description: Bug 4971: Strange 'copy package' issue occurs when performing the following steps: 1. Navigate to the 'org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui' package in the 'jdt.ui' project. 2. Select the package 'xxx' as the destination for copying. As a result of this operation, the package 'ui' is duplicated within the package 'xxx'.
OB: The package 'ui' is present inside the package 'xxx'.
SR: 1. Open the 'jdt.ui' project in Eclipse. 2. Navigate to the 'org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui' package. 3. Right-click on the package and select 'Copy'. 4. Right-click on the 'xxx' package and select 'Paste'. Check if the package 'ui' is duplicated within the 'xxx' package.
